column5: Its nice that ya take the wife along to show ya up there Ben..

Hey thanks everyone.  Kelly has been checking out your comments and I think it's going to her head. haha.  Simon - yes, good eye.  I got the jr. version of yours.  Does a good job in my little Fish Trap Guide.  We also cook lunch on it! lol.

Kelly had a day off today so we loaded up the gear and hit the ice looking for walleye.  She's not one for the cold and doesn't get out ice fishing much.  In fact, she's never caught a fish through the ice.  Of course, she ends up landing a dandy.... her first fish through the ice ever is this fat 24" walleye      She played it like a pro on my UL set-up with 4lb test.  We hit a few under 18" that we kept for the pan, including one that kelly got jigging.  Man, was I ever proud of her hookset - hard and fast!    Here was my prize for the day.  At least it'll eat
The women rule once again  Nice fish, congrats to the wife on a fine catch.  Joey
Beautiful fish, Kudos to your wife!
yeah, they always get the big one why is that

I was i could get my Girlfriend into fishing. She likes fishing for bluegills and is content. Im trying to talk her into a boat so that we can get out on the water and catch something BIG... well bigger then a bluegill haha  Congrats to the wife for the first fish through the ice ! It was a good one !!!

All nice fish for sure Ben.  lunker, you have access to a dock in the evening during the softwater season?  if so get her to fish with a jitterbug off that dock.  if she get's a nice fish then you are more likely to get her out in the boat.  that is my wifes fav. way to fish, on the dock in the evening BUT she will go out for trips in the boat too now that she has a 2.5LB bass under her belt...
Holy smokes, her's certainly tops yours. That is one big fat walleye. Great catch and nice report.  Dirk..

Nice report, very beautiful looking walleye. It's not a bad thing to get outfished is it?!?!? I actually enjoy it, knowing the other person had lots of fun! My sister outfished me by far only on her 2nd time ever fishing, and 1st time on the ice, it was the best trip!

Great report and pics Ben  Congratulations to Kelly for her first    Monster eye    Beauty Bet she's hook now and won't let you off the hook that easily next time you got out for eyes, well let just say that you won't be able to say that it's for research  Great job you guys.... keep it up and thanks for sharing Leechman
Really nice report, Ben! Great pics too. Congrats to you and Kelly. Oh and Kelly...I know that I don't need to tell you this but you have one helluva tutor there. Good stuff!
Great fish again Ben I mean Kelly!   .  Them northern eye's look awesome.
OH YEAH!!  You're a lucky little duo ain't ya?!    HD
always love the great report you put in !  GR8 walleye........  my g-f out fished me two this week!
What a Gorgeous Walleye....   Nice going Kelly

Dang wimmins!... always stealin' the big fish away from the menz!!!  Congrats to Miss Kelly for swiping your fish Ben!!!  When Momma's happy... everyones happy!!!     Shouldn't you be cookin' supper and ironing the curtains or something?
Well I just finished the dishes!! hahaha
TMI Ben!!!
Beauty fish Ben. I used to fish with my wife all the time before kids came along, enjoy it while you can.
Well done again Ben. This is a pretty good trend you are setting. You going to mention this one in your article in Outdoor Canada?  My wife always gets the big one too!  .
Its not to often everyone's happy....

Great looking wally and a terrific way to spend the day. I always enjoy spending a day out fishing with the GF, unfortunately it doesn't happen very often.  Dishes, hell I have to do 'em everyday along with the laundry, the groceries, the vaccuming......etc, etc, etc......
Good report thanks, well done Kelly...
nice eye congrats
ohhh Walleye  thanks for the tease.
great stuff Kelly!  good you are able to pass on your fishing skills to Ben   btw Ben.....new heater?
